g.text: Request to get participant's FSP details
Validate request against Mojaloop Interface Specification.
Request to get participant's FSP details.
REFERENCE: Get Oracle Routing Config Sequence
Fetch Oracle Routing information based on {TYPE}.
if lookup for Oracle based on {CURRENCY} if and only if {CURRENCY} is provided
SELECT oe.value, oe.centralSwitchEndpointId, et.type as endpointType FROM account_lookup.oracleEndpoint as oe
inner join account_lookup.currency as cu on oe.currencyId = cu.currencyId
inner join account_lookup.endpointType as et on oe.endpointTypeId = et.endpointTypeId
inner join account_lookup.partyIdType as pt on oe.partyIdTypeId = pt.partyIdTypeId
inner join account_lookup.centralSwitchEndpoint as cs on oe.centralSwitchEndpointId = cs.centralSwitchEndpointId
else lookup default Oracle if no {CURRENCY} is provided:
SELECT oe.value, oe.centralSwitchEndpointId, et.type as endpointType FROM account_lookup.oracleEndpoint as oe
inner join account_lookup.endpointType as et on oe.endpointTypeId = et.endpointTypeId
inner join account_lookup.partyIdType as pt on oe.partyIdTypeId = pt.partyIdTypeId
inner join account_lookup.centralSwitchEndpoint as cs on oe.centralSwitchEndpointId = cs.centralSwitchEndpointId
List of oracleEndpoint for the Participant
if list of oracleEndpoint results is empty.
REFERENCE: Request Participant Information from Oracle Sequence
Request to get participant's FSP details
Request to get participant's FSP details
REFERENCE: Get Switch Routing Config Sequence
[if {centralSwitchEndpointId} has been attained from 'REFERENCE: Get Oracle Routing Config Sequence' or if list of oracleEndpoint results is NOT empty]
select cs.value, et.type as endpointType from account_lookup.centralSwitchEndpoint as cs
inner join account_lookup.endpointType as et on cs.endpointTypeId = et.endpointTypeId
where centralSwitchEndpointId = {centralSwitchEndpointId from 'REFERENCE: Get Oracle Routing Config Sequence'};
Retrieve the PayerFSP Participant Callback End-point.
Retrieve the PayerFSP Participant Callback End-point - GET /participants/{FSPIOP-Source}/endpoints.
List of PayerFSP Participant Callback End-points
List of PayerFSP Participant Callback End-points
Match PayerFSP Participant Callback End-points for `FSPIOP_CALLBACK_URL_PARTICIPANT_PUT`
[Empty list of End-Points returned or Error occurred]
Retrieve the Participant Callback End-point - GET /participants/{FSPIOP-Source}/endpoints.
